name: Entei
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

abilities.name: Legendary Body
abilities.effect: As long as Entei is your Active Pokémon, Entei and Energy cards attached to it aren’t affected by effects from Trainer cards other than Stadium cards. As long as this Power is active, discard any Trainer cards attached to Entei. (This power works even if Entei is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.)

attacks.name: Mega Flame
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each tails, discard 1 {R} Energy card from Entei, if it has any.
